pullrequest.title: Added some accessors to Road and updated unit test.

content.raw:
Perhaps the `test/worlds/road_textures.world` should be deleted since it is an outdated duplicate of `worlds/road_textures.world`?

Also, if a ground plane is added to the road_textures.world, then the textures display funny. Perhaps their elevation should be raised slightly above `z=0`?
content.html:
Perhaps the test/worlds/road_textures.world should be deleted since it is an outdated duplicate of worlds/road_textures.world?

Also, if a ground plane is added to the road_textures.world, then the textures display funny. Perhaps their elevation should be raised slightly above z=0?
